biocontainers.name: adam
biocontainers.summary: Genomics analysis platform built on apache avro, apache spark, and apache parquet

biotools.summary: Model selective breeding schemes for animals using stochastic simulation. The program simulates a population of animals and traces the genetic changes in the population under different selective breeding scenarios. It caters for different population structures, genetic models, selection strategies, and mating designs. It can be used to evaluate breeding schemes and generate genetic data to test statistical tools.
